Keywords: Codex , Maximum Carnage , Monster , Reporter , Sinister Syndicate , Spider-Man Family
Real Name: Eddie Brock
Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Secret Identity
MOVEMENT: Elevated, Hindering
SYMBIOTE CODEX HUNTER: Plasticity, Shape Change. // When Venom KO's an opposing character, after resolutions heal 1 click. If that character had the Codex keyword, heal 3 clicks instead.
DRIVEN MAD BY KNULL: Charge, but do not halve speed. When Venom uses it, after resolutions deal 1 penetrating damage to each adjacent character (friendly and opposing).
THE SYMBIOTE IS TAKING OVER: STOP. Toughness. // FREE: roll a d6. 1: Give Venom an action token. 2-5: Choose one to last until your next turn: Impervious -or- Regeneration. 6: Heal 2 clicks.
